<color=orange>Hearthians</color>
1
PLUME: To think we would not find our friends from the crash on the bramble's exterior, but these familiar species instead, preserved within this glacier...
2
1
OENO: This.. This is an incredible discovery. We now can confidently conclude that both these species once originated on this planet destroyed by the bramble.
3
2
OENO: When the planet was shattered, they must have become stowaways within fragments of the planet scattered across the star system, crashing on the planets that would become their habitats today.
4
3
CASSAVA: That these species survived - and continue to thrive on these alien planets - despite their displacement, is nothing short of awe-inspiring! Their resilience inspires me greatly.
5
4
PLUME: In the heartbreaking absence of any trace of the survivors here.. this discovery is a beacon of light.
6
5
PLUME: I wish to learn from these species' perserverance and undying courage in the face of hardships.
7
6
CASSAVA: They have much to teach all of us. I am certain that if we simply work together and perservere, our clan will accomplish anything we set our hearts to!
